summary: WHEN VEHICLE WAS STOPPED ON AN INCLINE WITH GEAR PLACED IN PARK BEFORE ENGAGING PARKING BRAKE THE TRANSMISSION LOCKED IN PARK.  IN ORDER TO UNLOCK IT THE CONSUMER HAD TO HAVE THE TOW TRUCK PULL THE VEHICLE IN ORDER TO UNLOCK IT.   THE MANUFACTURER ADVISED THAT THIS WAS NORMAL OPERATION.  TRUCK IS A 2003 GMC 1/2TON 4-WHEEL DRIVE PICKUP.   *NLM
